pull.title: Use proper lowercase "k" for kB measurements
pull.body: Note: Did not update the Qt debug window's Network Traffic tab because it really is using 1024-base units (which is uppercase-K).

events.message: Use proper lowercase "k" for kB measurements

events.body: ACK for @theuni's trivial-next tree, better to file these at his github directly https://github.com/theuni/bitcoin
